column4: in which /dev/... can i found partition that are on a RAID 1 / SCSI adapter ??
instead of huntin the /dev directory maybe you should check "sudo fdisk -l" or "sudo parted" (and type "print" and "quit" afterwards)

ah, so raid isn't actually set up on the machine. you just want to have a peek at the harddisk is that it?
